actions.name: Ralts-Class Sandwiches
actions.description: These sandwiches are made with a love for the craft that the diner can really feel. They confer the same benefits as the Lechonk-class sandwich, but for one skill-check in the following day they can instead gain a +30 benefit instead of the +10 passively granted. These filling sandwiches confer a +10 to all Skill checks made in the following day, and allow you to gain an additional +20 on one skill check of your choosing in the following day.
